MAN.TITLE: OUT_f
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Scicos Super Block regular output port

DESCRIPTION.P: This block must only be used inside Scicos Super Blocks to represent a regular output port.
In a Super Block, regular output ports must be numbered from 1 to the number of regular output ports.
size of the output is determined by the compiler according to the connected blocks port sizes.

ITEM.label: Port number
ITEM.SP: : an integer giving the port number.
